name: Animate JSFL Script File
summary: Learn about .JSFL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: JSFL files are used to automate events and workflows in the Adobe Animate authoring environment. They can be created by selecting the following menu option: File → New → JSFL Script File.
NOTE: Animate was formerly known as Flash, which was originally developed by Macromedia but then merged with Adobe in 2005. Flash became Animate in 2016.

description: Script written in Flash JavaScript (JSFL), an API that extends regular JavaScript to include the Flash Document Object Model (DOM); contains JFSL program code written in a plain text format.
